BBQFS.M.DE.LRBA.TA_GDP._X.0000: Total assets of German banks in relation to gross domestic product - Landesbanken and regional insitutions of credit cooperatives (FSR 2014)

Methodology: Annualised quarterly data have been used for the gross domestic product. Within the Bilanzrechtsmodernisierungsgesetz the calculation of total assets (inclusion of derivative trading securities) was adjusted in 2010.
